radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal coronary arteries, identified a pulmonary arteriovenous malformation (PAVM) within the lingula.
Structurally normal heart and no evidence of an underlying infiltrative disorder.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Confirmed no residual right-to-left shunt post-embolisation.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Confirmed the presence of a pulmonary arteriovenous fistula.
QP:QS shunt ratio of 9.5% before embolisation and no residual right-to-left shunt after the procedure.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in shunt ratio after coil embolisation.
